title: Wonder at Chemotimelines 2024: MedTimeline: An End-to-End NLP System for Timeline Extraction from Clinical Narratives
details: L Wang, Q Lu, R Li, S Fu, H Liu - Proceedings of the 6th Clinical Natural Language …, 2024
abstract: Extracting timeline information from clinical narratives is critical for cancer research and practice using electronic health records (EHRs). In this study, we apply MedTimeline, our end-to-end hybrid NLP system combining large language model …
